page.title: 11NEWS REVIEW W/B 20thMAY 1985
page.content: The following items were prominent in the " Staffordshire Evening Sentinel" during the week beginning 20th.May 1985. In particular the outbreak at Stafford General Hospital of Legion- naires' Disease was a matter of local concern which was also given national and international coverage. 1.Legionnaires' Disease At Stafford. 2.Drugs 3.Strikes 4.Violence and Crime 5."Pop Scene" 6.Animal Stories 7.Royalty 8.Politics 9.Bradford City F.C.Fire Aftermath 10.Football Crowd Violence 11.Teachers' Strikes and Sanctions 12.Nurses' Wages 13.Unemployment-Michelin Tyre Factory.
